HELLO_MESSAGE: Mbote, tuya kwenu mu aplikasaun eto ya kitoko!
EDD_NOT_SELECTED: Lumbu kia butuka kizitu ko sonikanga.
ENTER_EMAIL: Kota email yaku mu tambula nkutu ya sika
RESET_SENT: Email ya nkutu ya sika yatumina! Tala mu sanduku yaku.
NEED_TO_REGISTER: Uzolele kusonikila ku nganga mu kumona mayambu maku
LOGIN_VALIDATION_2: Tuvana kota adresse ya email ya solosolo.
LOGIN_VALIDATION_3: Kisonga kya email ko kizolele kuba mpamba
LOGIN_VALIDATION_5: Kisonga kya nk utu ko kizolele kuba mpamba
ERROR_LOADING_VITAL_INFORMATION: Kufua mu kufungula makebisu ma ntinu:
NO_VITAL_INFORMATION: Kaka nkanda wa makebisu ma ntinu
NO_VITAL_INFORMATION_2: Mukongo ko katumina makebisu ma ntinu ko
F_P_1: Zitu yaku ibandika ntango muntu ya bakala akatula leke mu nitu yaku.
F_P_2: Mu bandika ya lumingu yayi, ukotisa leke. Leke yaku likutana ye leke ya bakala mu bilumbu 12 te 24 sima. Mu bilumbu bilandaka, leke likutaniswa (bitedila zygote) libandika kugabana mu maselo mayingi ntango likenda mu tube ya fallopian, likota mu nitu yaku, ye libandika kuziama mu kanda ya nitu.
F_P_3: Bola yaku ya maselo buabu kena embryon ya solosolo. Buabu uzidi ye bilumingu 4 kuyambuka mu bandika ya masiku maku ma suka.
F_P_4: Buabu kubandika kusala ye kingo. Ntima ye minkisi ikuenda kubakula. Mapupu, vumu ye ini zibandika kubakula mpe.
F_P_5: Kena mu tango yayi - ntango masiku maku malandaka mazolele kuyiza - nge ukwenda mona mayele ya solosolo mu kuyekula zitu ya nzo.
F_P_6: Ameka pafupi 5cm ye abandika kusala bisalu biandi. Kugunda kwa ntima ya mwana kukwenda kuwa kasi ye bisalu bya ngudi kaka.
F_P_7: Lumingu yayi bisalu bya mwana waku bibandika: Minoko miandi miyabandika kufunguka ye kuziba, minoko mya makulu miyakhotha, ye munwa wandi wusala bisalu bya kunyonya.
F_P_8: Meso ma mwana makwenda kupenya ye ntima ye minkisi bimaniswa kimvuka. Ndenge ya nsuki mu ntu ya mwana ibandikila, ata nsuki yandi yimoneka ko.
F_P_9: Makulu mandi mabakwile mingi, ntu wandi wuteleme, ye matu mandi mafupi ye bisonga biandi bya suka. Minoko mya manja ye makulu ya mwana mizidi ye bisonia bya minoko. Mwana buabu ameka pafupi 11-12cm ye akilo pafupi 100 grams.
F_P_10: Nkulu ya nitu yaku (vumu) buabu kena 7.8cm nse ya kimpupu kyaku.
F_P_11: Bakisa nyama, mbizi, makonde to maki ye stew yaku ya manioc to banane mu vana nguya ku mwana waku.
F_P_12: Bakisa lumbu konso mbuma ye matiti ma verde, nguba zikitoko mpe, kema mungwa mu bidia byaku.
F_P_13: Uzolele kuba ye nsinkhu nse buabu. Enati nsinkhu ikuenda, yova ku mvani ngudi mu klinik ya bamama bazolele.
F_P_14: Ameka pafupi 5cm ye abandika kusala bisalu biandi. Kugunda kwa ntima ya mwana kukwenda kuwa kasi ye bisalu bya ngudi kaka.
F_P_15: Kilo kiandi buabu kena 500-600 grams. Ayamukila bisono mu kusunuka to ntima wandi wugunda nkua. Enati umona bisunuka bya kiuka azidi ye hiccups. Mwana akwenda kuwa kena wubalukila mu nitu. Akwenda kuwa nzembo, nzambi yaku, kuwa bisunuka byaku, kuwa manja maku ntango umufina.
F_P_16: Mwana waku azidi ye ndenge ya molai ye ya kema, kasi bitango bya kunena bikuya. Kanda kiandi kizidi kya kema ye ya kumona nkati, kasi kiyasinuka buabu mpe.
F_P_17: Mwana azidi ye 35cm molai ye akilo kilo mosi. Asunuka mingi ye afina mingi buabu. Asanga enati butuka babandika kala, mwana waku akwenda kuba ye luzingu kasi kitoko kena akalaka nkati kwa bilumingu 10 biaka!
F_P_18: Kumona kwa mwana waku kubakula, nkia kukwenda kumsadisa kumona kimia kikulaka kuyambuka kunza. Akwenda kupenya, ye nsidze ziandi zibakwile.
F_P_19: Yuvula nganga yaku mambu ma makebisu ma butuka ya kala. Tala plano yaku ya butuka ye kutelema butuka, longuka makebisu ma nkua ye makebisu, ye bonso butuka kibandika.
F_P_20: Mwana akilo pafupi 2kg buabu ye asunuka mingi. Makutu ma kanda makuleka ntango mafuta mabandika kusala nse ya kanda. Kati ya buabu ye butuka biandi, mwana waku ayabakisa kati ya kilo mosi ye zole.
F_P_21: Mbala uzidi kubakisa pafupi livre mosi mu lumingu buabu. Ndambu yabakisa kenda ku mwana waku, nkia ayabakisa ndambu to ndambu ya kilo kiandi kya butuka mu bilumingu sambo bilandaka mu kutelema luzingu ya kunza ya nitu.
F_P_22: Bana basinukana mu kilo, bakala mbala mingi bazidi banene kuvutuka bana ba nkento, bampasa bazidi banini kuvutuka bamosi, bazitu bazidi banene to banini.
F_P_23: Enati mwana waku munini kasi abakula kimvuka kena kitoko. Mu nkingu yayi azidi pafupi 47cm ye akilo pafupi 2.7kg. Bongo ye mapupu bisukilanga.
F_P_24: Ntu wutalanga nse buabu, wuteleme butuka. Butuka kati ya bilumingu 37-42 kena ya kitoko.
F_P_25: Kuna kandi! Lumbu kia butuka kia mwana mu kubakula kimvuka kibalwa kwa bilumingu 40 bya zitu, kasi butuka ya tango ya solosolo kukwenda kuba kuyambuka lumingu 38 te 42.
F_P_26: Enati butuka ko kibandika yawu mu bilumingu 42, butuka kukwenda kubandiswa ye nganga mu ngololo ya mwana ye yaku.
F_P_27: Enati uvutukile lumbu yaku ya butuka, mbala ko uzidi kala nse bonso ukanisa, yampe enati ubalanga kaka mu lumbu kia masiku maku ma suka. Ntango bamama batotisa leke kala kuvutuka bonso bazolele.
VALIDATION_2: Tuvana tula kisonga kya mbanza ye vata
VALIDATION_Q_4: Tuvana tula kisonga kya mbanza ye vata
VALIDATION_Q_5: Tuvana tula kisonga kya numeru ya mayele
VALIDATION_Q_12: Tuvana tula kisonga kya ngudi ya ngudi
VALIDATION_Q_17: Tuvana kota ID yaku ya muntu
SELECT_SAMPLES: Songa kimosi mu bifoto byeto bya ndakisa to bakisa byaku
CHOOSE_PROFILE_STYLE: Songa style ya foto yaku ya profil:
PASSWORD_V: Nkutu uzolele kuba ye makomi 6 ye makomi ye banumeru
YOU_FIRST: Kuyambuka mu bandika, malavu, kusuta ye bilongo (ye bitiye bya matiti) bikwenda kubebisa ngudi ya mwana waku.
YOU_SECOND: Yawu kufueti kuzaya enati uzolele mwana ye kuluka mayele ye sadisa kuyambuka ku bavani ngudi ba mayele.
YOU_THIRD: Ngonda mosi, mabele maku makwenda kuba ma mpasi ye ma tupa kala. Uwa bonso uzolele kusanza mbala mingi? Mu bilumingu mafueti kiyasuka
YOU_FOURTH: Kunua tiye ya kema ye kudia bifueti bya bidia mu tango, ko bya mafuta mingi, bya sukali to bya mungwa, kuyakema nsinkhu.
YOU_FIFTH: Mu ngudi ya mwana waku, ko kunua malavu, ko kusala bitiye bya matiti to tabac to bilongo bya chanvre. Dia bidia bya ngudi.
YOU_SIXTH: Mu ngudi ya mwana waku, ko kunua malavu, ko kusala bitiye bya matiti to tabac to bilongo bya chanvre. Dia bidia bya ngudi.
VAGINAL_BLEEDING: Vova ambulance kiuka! Kutioloka menga mingi kuyambuka mu maliseche kuzolele sadisa ya nganga kiuka.
BABY_COMING: Mwana waku akuya! Vova ambulance kiuka.
CONTRACTION_DETECTED: Bikangama bya nguya bimonwa. Vova mvani ngudi yaku to kutelema kenda ku ngudi.
BABY_MOVEMENT: Mambu ma bisunuka bya mwana mamonwa. Vova mvani ngudi yaku kiuka ye kutelema kenda ku ngudi.
IMPORTANT_1: YA NTINU: Luzingu lwaku ye lwa mwana waku lukwenda kulandakana ye kusala kiuka!
BLEEDING_1: Enati uzidi kutioloka menga mingi kuyambuka mu maliseche, ko zolela - vova ambulance ya liboso!
BLEEDING_2: Enati uzidi kutioloka menga mingi kuyambuka mu maliseche, ko zolela - vova ambulance ya liboso!
BLEEDING_DESCRIPTION_1: Mu bilumingu bya liboso, kutioloka menga kefueti kukwenda kuba ya kimvuka, kasi kutioloka menga mingi kena kiuka mu tango zonse.
VAGINA_QUESTION_1: Kutioloka kwa maliseche kwa nkua ye kwa langi?
VAGINA_QUESTION_2: Kutioloka kwa maza ma bonso maza kuyambuka mu maliseche?
VAGINA_QUESTION_5: Kutioloka kwa maza ma bonso maza kuyambuka mu maliseche?
VAGINA_QUESTION_8: Mambu ma kaka to mambu ma kaka?
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_1: Kutioloka kwa nkua, kwa yellow kumonisa maladu mazolele kuchiza.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_2: Yayi ikuyambuka mu sac amniotique kuna mwana akala.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_3: Kima putulu ye tusi. Fuka munwa ye zulu ye pagne kunza.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_4: Meka kukumbuka enati udia kima kibandisile to uzidile ye muntu wa maladu.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_5: Makebisu maya pamosi makwenda kumonisa kimvuka kya ngozi.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_6: Sima ya bilumingu 24, kota tango lumbu konso mu kuwa enati mwana asunuka. Sima ya lumingu 32, kizimi kya kiuka kuzolele kuyekula.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_7: Yova muntu wa minu nkia akwenda kusadisa kukota nsamu enati kuzolewa.
HEALTH_QUESTION_4: Kufua kuwa mu manja ye makulu?
HEALTH_QUESTION_8: Kena ulemba nkua mu kusala bisalu bya lumbu konso?
HEALTH_QUESTION_9: Kena uzidile ye ntu kuwawa mbala mingi kuyambuka ntango ukatula zitu?
HEALTH_QUESTION_10: Kena uzidi ye ntu kuwawa lelu?
HEALTH_QUESTION_11: Kena uzidile ye fievre kuyambuka ntango ukatula zitu?
HEALTH_QUESTION_15: Kena usala plano ya butuka ye ya kiuka?
HEALTH_QUESTION_16: Kena uwa kutupa mu makulu, manja, to luse?
HEALTH_QUESTION_17: Kena umonanga bikangama to vumu kukanga?
HEALTH_QUESTION_18: Kena uteleme sac yaku ya ngudi?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_1: Ntango uzidi ye zitu, fievre yonso izolele kuyekulwa mu kutalisa kena koyabebisa mwana waku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_2: Kena kitoko kena uwa kitoko! Enda kulandakana kumonanga masinisa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_3: Tuvana landakana makebisu maku kimvuka. Enati kimvuka kyaku kibebiswa, luka sadisa ya nganga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_4: Enati uwa mbi mu tango zonse, tuvana yuvula mvani ngudi yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_5: Kufua kuwa kuyambuka mu zitu kena ya kimvuka, kasi enati kya ngozi, kanisa kusolola ye nganga yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_6: Kena kitoko kuwa yayi! Enati ubandika kuwa kufua, landakana ntango ye mbala bonga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_7: Enati kufua kuenda, kilombwa kuluka mayele kuyambuka ku mvani ngudi yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_8: Kulemba kena ya kimvuka, kasi talisa kena uleka mokwanyi. Enati kubebiswa, yuvula nganga yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_9: Kuba ye nguya kena ya kitoko! Enda ye ndenge yaku ya buabu ye sinisa enati kuzolewa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_10: Enati kulemba kuenda mu nkingu yawu, kanisa kusinisa ndenge yaku to kusolola ye nganga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_11: Masinisa ma hormone makwenda kubanga masinisa ma makanisi. Enati mabebisa ngudi yaku, kanisa mayele to mayele ma nganga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_12: Kubika makanisi ma teleme kena kitoko! Enda kusala bisalu biasadisa ngudi ya makanisi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_13: Enati masinisa ma makanisi maenda, mayele ma kupumula to kusolola ye nganga makwenda kusadisa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_14: Bilayiko ye bizoyiko kena bya kimvuka. Talisa bidia byaku bikala bya ndimbula ye yuvula nganga yaku enati uzidi ye mambu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_15: Bidia bya ndimbula kena bya kitoko mu tango ya zitu. Enda kutalisa bidia.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_16: Enati bilayiko to bizoyiko byaku bikala bya kimvuka, enda kubilandakana ye talisa kena udia kitoko.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_17: Nsinkhu za nsuka kena za kimvuka mu zitu, kasi enati za ngozi to za kuenda, yuvula mvani ngudi yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_18: Kena kitoko kena ko uwa nsinkhu. Enda kulandakana masinisa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_19: Enati nsinkhu ienda, meka bidia bifueti, mbala mingi ye yuvula nganga yaku enati kuzolewa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_20: Leka ya kitoko kena ya ntinu. Enda kubika ndenge ya leka ya ngudi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_21: Meka kusinisa bisonga byaku bya leka ye ndenge. Enati kufua leka kuenda, solola ye mvani ngudi yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_22: Enati mambu ma leka maenda, kanisa kusinisa ndenge yaku to kuluka mayele ma nganga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_23: Stress ye nkua kena bya kimvuka kasi bizolele kuyangalwa. Kanisa mayele ma kupumula to kusolola ye nganga wa makanisi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_24: Kubika makanisi ma kizimi kena kitoko! Enda kusala mayele ma kulemisa stress.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_25: Enati stress to nkua ienda, kanisa kusolola mayele ma kulemisa ye nganga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_26: Bisunuka bya mwana bya kimvuka kena kisonia kya kitoko. Enda kulandakana ye sonia masinisa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_27: Kufua bisunuka kukwenda kuba kya mambu. Tuvana vova mvani ngudi yaku kiuka.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_28: Enati uenda kumonanga bisunuka bifueti, kena ya ntinu kuluka mayele ma nganga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_29: Kena ya ntinu kusolola mambu monso ye mvani ngudi yaku. Kusala kiuka kena ya ntinu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_30: Kena kitoko kena uwa kitoko ye ndenge ya zitu yaku. Enda kulandakana bonso uwa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_31: Enati uenda kuba ye mambu mawu, ko koyogha kumasolola ye nganga wa ngudi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_32: Kuyambuka mu bandika, malavu, kusuta ye bilongo (ye bitiye bya matiti) bikwenda kubebisa ngudi ya mwana waku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_33: Yawu kufueti kuzaya enati uzolele mwana ye kuluka mayele ye sadisa kuyambuka ku bavani ngudi ba mayele.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_34: Ngonda mosi, mabele maku makwenda kuba ma mpasi ye ma tupa kala. Uwa bonso uzolele kusanza mbala mingi? Mu bilumingu mafueti kiyasuka
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_35: Kunua tiye ya kema ye kudia bifueti bya bidia mu tango, ko bya mafuta mingi, bya sukali to bya mungwa, kuyakema nsinkhu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_36: Mu ngudi ya mwana waku, ko kunua malavu, ko kusala bitiye bya matiti to tabac to bilongo bya chanvre. Dia bidia bya ngudi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_37: Mu bilumingu 8-11, kaka kima kimoneka ko kasi ukwenda kuwa kulemba ye nsinkhu mbala mingi yampe mu nsuka. Kiyasuka mu bilumingu mafueti
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_38: Kunua tiye ya kema ye kudia bifueti ko bya mafuta ye mungwa mingi kusadisa
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_39: Enati uzidi kuwa nsinkhu mbala mingi sima ya bilumingu 12, yova ku mvani ngudi yaku. Yuvula nkazi yaku aye. Azolele kuyekulwa maladu mpe.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_40: Uzibula masiku maku zole? Uzidi ye nsinkhu ye mabele maku mawa kufueti ya kilo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_41: Mbala umonile, bampe bafueti bayamona, kasi kena kitoko kenda ku klinik ya ANC buabu mu kubandika kitoko zitu yaku ye kuyekula maladu ma mbi, mayele ye bilongo bya vitamini.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_42: Ye, enati kuzolewa bilongo, mu kubika nge ye mwana waku mu ngololo ye ngudi. Yuvula nkazi yaku aye mpe.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_43: Bakisa nyama, mbizi, makonde to maki ye stew yaku ya manioc to banane mu vana nguya ku mwana waku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_44: Bakisa lumbu konso mbuma ye matiti ma verde, nguba zikitoko mpe, kema mungwa mu bidia byaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_45: Uzolele kuba ye nsinkhu nse buabu. Enati nsinkhu ikuenda, yova ku mvani ngudi mu klinik ya bamama bazolele
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_46: Mu lumingu 20-23, uzolele kubandika kuwa mwana afina ye asunuka enati uleka kizimi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_47: Kaka bilumingu 18-20 liboso mwana abutuka, kasi kima kikwenda kusala kimubanga meka kuya kala, buna kutelema
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_48: Mu nzila yaku yalandaka ya prenatal, enda ye bakala yaku to muntu wa minu ye solola plano yaku ya butuka ye ya kiuka ye basali ba klinik
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_49: Mama yayi azidi ye zitu ya bilumingu 24 (ngonda 7). Azidi ye ngudi. Adia bidia bya ngudi, asala bisalu bya nitu, aleka kefueti kasi ko mingi.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_50: Buabu mwana ayabandika kubakula nkua, buna dia biproteine mingi (mbizi, maki, nyama, maza ye matiti ma verde ye bidia byonso ye mbuma za tango). Keba, mwana waku akwenda kuzimonisa kala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_51: Ngonda tatu to nse liboso butuka kena plano yaku ya butuka iteleme?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_52: Vumu yaku uzolele kubakula nkua buabu ye mabele maku mabakula ye maba ma mpasi mu kutelema kuyamisa
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_53: Leka mu nsima. Kala ye bisalu kasi ko kutwala biloko bya kilo to kulima
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_54: Vumu yaku kena ya nene buabu ye kuyabakula mingi ntango mwana waku abakisa 1 te 2 kg
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_55: Maza ma yellow makwenda kutioloka mu mabele maku. Bitedila colostrum, ye kisalaka mu kutelema mabele maku kusala maza
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_56: Enati kukwenda enda ku klinik ya ANC bilumingu zole mu nkingu yayi ya zitu enati ko ukwenda kenda, kutana ye mvani ngudi yaku na JamboMama
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_57: Zitu yaku buabu kena pafupi bilumingu 36: butuka kufupi! Plano ya butuka iteleme? Muntu wa minu ateleme? Bima byonso biteleme? Enda ku plano yaku ya butuka mbala mosi kaka!
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_58: Mayele: Ntango ubakula kilo kena ya ngololo kuleka mu mpangi ya kiba mu kubika oksijeni ye menga makuenda ku mwana waku
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_60: Enati mwana waku kaka ko, kala wuteleme kenda ku ngudi mu tango yonso. Talisa mwana waku aenda kusunuka ye leka ye pumula mu mpangi ya kiba. Enati kivutukile bilumingu 40 ye kaka kima ko, vova RHP yaku.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_61: Ngonda tatu to nse liboso butuka kena plano yaku ya butuka iteleme?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_62: Uzolele kulandakana kimvuka. Enati butuka ko kibandika yawu mu lumingu 42, bikangama (mpasi za butuka) bikwenda kubandiswa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_63: Mwana waku abutuka! Nsangu! Uenda ku ngudi mu tango ya solosolo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_64: Pumula kitoko, yamisa mwana waku ye kala mu kukutana ye mvani ngudi yaku! Bilumbu kumi bya liboso bizidi kya ngozi ya nene. Landakana makebisu maya ma ngozi mu nge. Fievre, kutioloka menga, to kutioloka kwa nkua kuyambuka mu maliseche, kugwedezeka.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_65: Mu mwana waku: fievre, kugwedezeka, kufua kupema, ko kusunuka, kuyamwa ko kitoko. Vova sadisa ya kiuka mu mwana waku kiuka ntango uzidi ye mambu ma kima kyonso!
ANY_OTHER_QUESTION_1: Limbula mambu ma kaka mazidi naku...
THANK_YOU_1: Matondo mama! RHP yaku iyatanga yayi ye kukuvova enati kuzolewa. Enati makebisu mabebiswa, vova mvani ngudi yaku to ngudi ya kufupi. Formulaire ilemiswa mu kusala yalandaka
LOADING_USER_DATA: Tuvana zolela, kufungula makebisu ma muntu...
LEARN: L o n g u k a
ASSESSMENT_FAILED: Kufua kubika kuyekula. Tuvana tala kukutana kyaku ye meka kaka. Mayambu maku mabikilwa.
ASSESSMENT_NOT_FOUND: Kaka kuyekula kya kiuka kimonwa mu mukongo yayi.
ERROR_12: Kaka mayambu kuyambuka ku mukongo yayi
ERROR_17: Ko uzidi ye mvani ngudi wakutaniswa mu kusolola
SELECT_LAST_MENSTRUAL_PERIOD_FLOW: Songa masiku ma suka ma nsinkhu (DD-MM-YYYY)
APPLICATION_SENT: Lombelo yaku yatumina ku portal ya admin yeto. Tuyakuvutukila nkua.
CRITICAL_VAGINA: YA NGOZI: Kutioloka menga mingi kwa maliseche kiyovwa
URGENT_VAGINA: YA KIUKA: Mukongo ayova mwana utelekile kusunuka
URGENT_VAGINA_2: YA KIUKA: Bikangama bya mpasi bya kimvuka
WARNING_2: KEBA: Ntu kuwawa ya ngozi kiyovwa
_comment: Eteni yayi ikuyangala masinisa ma muntu
NAME_OF_CHOSEN_HEALTH_FACILITY: Nkombo ya ngudi ya ngudi yasongwa
NAME: Nkombo
HOW_LONG_TRIP: Nzila yayi ikota tango ya molai bonga?
STAY_AFTER_BIRTH: Kena bayakala ye nge te sima ya butuka?
WHAT_BLOOD_GROUP: Groupe ya menga yandi kena nki?
GIVE_BLOOD: Nani akwenda kuvana menga enati uzolele?
W_H_P: Mvani ngudi nki ayasadisa mu butuka?
NAME_CONTACT_TAXI: Nkombo ye makutano ma chauffeur taxi to muntu wa minu:
SAVE_TFARE: Enati uzolele kufuta transport, bandika kubika buabu!
PLANNING_VISIT_HEALTH_F: Ntango nki ukanisa kuyenda ku ngudi ya ngudi?
BRING_HEALTH_FACILITY: Bima biakuya ye ku ngudi ya ngudi:
SESSION_HC: Session yaku ye mvani ngudi isukile mu kufueti ya ngololo.
V_HEALTH_CARE: Tuvana talisa kuba kwa mvani ngudi mu kuenda.
IMPORTANT_M_I: Formulaire yayi izidi ye makebisu ma ntinu ma nganga mazolele kutulwa kaka ye sadisa ya nganga wa mayele.
HEALTHCARE_PROVIDER: Tuvana kala ye mvani ngudi yaku mu kutalisa ye kusadisa ye formulaire yayi.
ASK_VERIFICATION_CODE: Tuvana yuvula mvani ngudi yaku akote code yandi ya kutalisa:
INVALID_VERIFICATION_CODE: Code ya kutalisa ya kufua. Tuvana meka kaka.
VERIFIED_PRESENT: Mvani ngudi wataliswa uzolele kuba mu kutumina formulaire yayi.
V_PROVIDER: Tuvana talisa mvani ngudi mu kumanisa formulaire yayi
P_E_DOB: Tuvana kota lumbu yaku kia butuka
P_E_PH: Tuvana kota numeru ya telefone ya mukongo
P_E_EC: Tuvana kota kukutana kyaku kya kiuka

YOUR_OVER_ALL_WELL: Ngudi yaku yonso kena ya ntinu mu nge ye mwana waku.
S_O_B_N: Kufua kupema kukwenda kuba ya kimvuka mu zitu kasi kuzolele kulandakana.
F_D_P_E: Ntu kuwawa mbala mingi mu zitu kuzolele kuyekulwa.
C_H_S_U: Kimvuka kya ntu kuwawa kya buabu kusadisa kuzaya kya kiuka.
F_DP_B: Fievre mu zitu kuzolele sadisa ya nganga mu kuteteka mwana waku.

P_AHEAD: Kutelema liboso kusadisa kutalisa butuka ya ngololo mu nge ye mwana waku.

C_37: Bikangama liboso bilumingu 37 bikwenda kumonisa butuka ya kala.

F_F_C_H: Kala ye luzingu lukabana mambu monso - mvani ngudi yaku azidi awa mu kusadisa.
T_M_I: Matondo mama! Mvani ngudi yaku ayatanga makebisu maya ye kukuvova enati kuzolewa.
P_A_Q_S: Tuvana yamuka mambu monso liboso kutumina.
D_P_NEXT: Solola yayi ye mvani yaku mu nzila yalandaka.

THAT_GOOD_SIGN: Kena kisonia kya kitoko. Enda kulandakana.

C_CHW_S: Kuta CHW yaku mu kutala makebisu ma pre-eclampsia.

P_P_H_B: Tuvana telema sac yaku ya ngudi lumingu yayi.

L_C_C: Bikangama bya kema liboso lumingu 37 bikwenda kuteleka yawu. Bikangama bya nguya bikwenda kumonisa butuka to mambu.
R_W_G_1: Kubuta kilo ya mbote na ntangu ya 28 mingana: binga nkengi na yo ya lufutumuku (RHP)
R_W_G_2: Kubuta kilo fwete vanda 2-4 kg na kati ya mingana 19-28
R_W_G_3: Kubuta kilo fwete vanda 3-5 kg na kati ya mingana 29-40
R_W_G_5: \nBMI 18.5-24.9: Kubuta kilo ya mvimba 11.5-16 kg kele mbote
R_W_G_6: \nBMI ≥25: Kubuta kilo fioti kele ya kikesa
R_W_G_7: \nBMI ≥30: Kubuta kilo fwete vanda fioti mutindu mosi
R_W_G_8: Nge kele na anemia. Sala mapilili ya ferro na nkengi na nge ya lufutumuku sambu sikoyo.
R_W_G_9: Ferro ya nsi: Sala mapilili ya ferro na nkengi na nge na kilandi ya nsuka
R_W_G_10: Sungana ti nkengi na nge sambu na kupesa yo nsi
R_W_G_13: KUMANISIKE: Vundisa, kudisa mungwa, tubila nkengi na nge ya lufutumuku
R_W_G_14: Tension ya ngolo ya ntete: Keba, kenda na nkengi na nge ya lufutumuku
R_W_G_15: Tension ya ngolo ya zole: Binga muntu ya kusadisa na mpasi
R_W_G_16: Tension ya ngolo mingi: Binga muntu ya kusadisa na mpasi ntangu mosi
R_W_G_17: Ke mfunu ya kudivua - Nkengi na nge ta zaba
R_W_G_19: Diabete ya buta - Nkengi na nge ta zaba
R_W_G_21: Vundisa + sugana ti nkengi na nge ya lufutumuku
R_W_G_22: Kebisa! Nkengi na nge ta zaba
R_W_G_23: Beto ke mfunu ya ba mise à jour sambu na:
NHCAC: Nge ke mfunu ya lusadisu? Sungana ti nkengi na nge to kliniki ya buta
R_S_P: Sakola password na mutindu ya mpa
W_D_S_S: Na ntangu ya misala ya mpasi

PROVIDER_NOT_AVAILABLE_MESSAGE:
Mutedi wa lunungu mu mambu ma mbote kena vandila sik'yayi ko.

Tala ndongisilu andi wa kuvanda to umsanga ntangu wau salanga. Kana i mpimpa, kwenda na fwalasu ya mbote yena pene.
